item.title: Differently-abled must make use of welfare schemes: MP
item.description:
<![CDATA[Lok Sabha Member from Raichur, G. Kumar Naik, urged persons with disabilities (PWDs) to make full use of the welfare schemes introduced by the Centre and the State governments for their empowerment.
He was speaking after inaugurating the Nerale Mela, an employment and awareness fair for PWDs, along with sports and cultural activities, organised at the Auditorium of Raichur Institute of Medical Sciences (RIMS) in Raichur on Thursday.
Mr. Naik said that the government has rolled out multiple sch...]]>
